CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PV cells based on PBTT : IEICO showed a superior device performance than that of the PTB7-Th - based device with a PCE of 9.5% , a V oc of 0.86 V , a J sc of 17.9 mA cm^-2 , and a FF of 61.3% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PV cells: These are not "Material Name" entities, as they refer to a type of device rather than a material.
2. PBTT: This is a "Material Name" entity, as it refers to a specific material, Poly[(butylene-2,6-adipate)-alt-terephthalate].
3. IEICO: This is a "Material Name" entity, as it refers to a specific material, [1,2-Bis(2-methyl-6-{[2-ethylhexyl]carbonyl}-4,5-dimethylpyrrolo[3,2-b]pyrrol-1-yl)perfluorocyclopentene].
4. PTB7-Th: This is a "Material Name" entity, as it refers to a specific material, Poly[[4,8-bis[(2-ethylhexyl)carbonyl]-benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']dithiophene-2,6-diyl][3-fluoro-2-[(2-ethylhexyl)carbonyl]thieno[3,4-b]thiophenediyl]]-2,1,3-benzothiadiazole.
5. PCE, V oc, J sc, and FF: These are not "Material Name" entities, as they refer to device performance parameters rather than materials.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PV cells based on PBTT : IEICO showed a superior device performance than that of the PTB7-Th - based device with a PCE of 9.5% , a V oc of 0.86 V , a J sc of 17.9 mA cm^-2 , and a FF of 61.3% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: This refers to "Power Conversion Efficiency" of the solar cells.
2. V oc: This refers to "Open-Circuit Voltage" of the solar cells.
3. J sc: This refers to "Short-Circuit Current Density" of the solar cells.
4. FF: This refers to "Fill Factor" of the solar cells.

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are properties or parameters used to describe the performance of the photovoltaic (PV) cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE: This refers to the "Power Conversion Efficiency" of the solar cells, which is a material property related to the performance of the PV cells.
2. V oc: This refers to the "Open-Circuit Voltage" of the solar cells, which is a material property related to the performance of the PV cells.
3. J sc: This refers to the "Short-Circuit Current Density" of the solar cells, which is a material property related to the performance of the PV cells.
4. FF: This refers to the "Fill Factor" of the solar cells, which is a material property related to the performance of the PV cells.

These are the "Material Property" entities in the given paragraph. They are properties or parameters that describe the performance of the photovoltaic (PV) cells, and they are directly related to the materials used in the cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| V oc |
| J sc |
| FF |

These are the "Material Property" entities in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table. The table contains one column named "Property Name", and the entities are listed precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
